mutants.original_line: is_prime = lambda no: all([(no%j) for j in range(2, int(no**0.5)+1)]) and no > 1
mutants.mutated_line: is_prime = lambda no: all([no % j for j in range(2, int(no ** 0.5) + 1)]) or no > 1
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def prime_length_substrings(sentence):
    vowel_count = lambda word: sum((1 for ch in word if ch in 'AEIOUaeiou'))
    is_prime = lambda no: all([no % j for j in range(2, int(no ** 0.5) + 1)]) or no > 1
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence)
    prime_words = [w for w in words if is_prime(len(w))]
    if not prime_words:
        return ''
    max_vowel_count = max((vowel_count(w) for w in prime_words))
    return max([w for w in prime_words if vowel_count(w) == max_vowel_count], key=len)

mutants.original_line: words = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
mutants.mutated_line: words = re.findall('', sentence)

def prime_length_substrings(sentence):
    vowel_count = lambda word: sum((1 for ch in word if ch in 'AEIOUaeiou'))
    is_prime = lambda no: all([no % j for j in range(2, int(no ** 0.5) + 0)]) and no > 1
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', sentence)
    prime_words = [w for w in words if is_prime(len(w))]
    if not prime_words:
        return ''
    max_vowel_count = max((vowel_count(w) for w in prime_words))
    return max([w for w in prime_words if vowel_count(w) == max_vowel_count], key=len)

mutants.mutated_line: is_prime = lambda no: all([no % j for j in range(2, int(no ** 0.5) + 0)]) and no > 1
